title: ∞ The Dalrymple Report: HomePod, iOS 18.2, and Voice Memos
description: Dave is having a problem with his HomePod not recognizing his voice all of a sudden. Apple released iOS 18.2 adding more Apple Intelligence features that aren't really that good. Voice Memos also received an update with some features that are really good, escpaically for musicians. Follow this podcast Show Notes: Apple officially launches iOS 18.2 Voice Memos update brings Layered Recording to iPhone 16 Pro lineup New iOS 18.2 feature will ‘change the way we make music forever,’ says Michael Bublé Apple Stock Hits Record High On Second Wave Of AI Features Shows and movies we're watching Day of the Jackal, Peacock
author: Jim Dalrymple
excerpt: BBEdit 14, the power tool for text, adds Notes, vastly extended language support & more.
text: BBEdit 14, the power tool for text, adds Notes, vastly extended language support & more.
html: BBEdit 14, the power tool for text, adds Notes, vastly extended language support & more.
